goal: Write a humorous blog post about why Pepsi is superior to Coke
summary: The user used to be a Coke drinker but switched to Pepsi after trying the lime flavor. The user wants to use a light-hearted tone to persuade Coke drinkers to try Pepsi. There's no set structure or deadline for the blog post.

assistants.name: Humorist
assistants.responsibility: Inject humor into the blog post to keep it light-hearted and engaging
assistants.dependency: Depends on the Researcher for information about Pepsi and Coke
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user used to drink Coke but switched to Pepsi after trying the lime flavor

assistants.name: Researcher
assistants.responsibility: Research facts about Pepsi and Coke to provide content for the blog post
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user wants to persuade Coke drinkers to try Pepsi

assistants.name: Storyteller
assistants.responsibility: Craft a compelling narrative around the user's switch from Coke to Pepsi
assistants.dependency: Depends on the Humorist for the tone of the blog post
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user used to drink Coke but switched to Pepsi after trying the lime flavor

assistants.name: Editor
assistants.responsibility: Ensure the blog post is well-structured and free of errors
assistants.dependency: Depends on the Storyteller for the narrative of the blog post
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user wants a creative and engaging blog post
